settings.title: The Perfect Putting Mat - Standard Edition

settings.low_stock_text: Inventory is running low & we expect to sell out again! Order now to make sure you don't have to wait for the next shipment.

settings.quote: Anyone who is serious about improving their putting needs the Perfect Putting mat.  It’s done wonders for my confidence and become part of my daily practice.
settings.title: Dustin Johnson

settings.quote: It's awesome mate! For the elite and for kids too, my boys love it. It's teaching them the correct alignment...Thanks for the mat and looking forward to making more putts!!
settings.title: Marc Leishman

settings.quote: You make this putt, you can make any putt! (on the Perfect Practice Mat) All day, I'm buying!
settings.title: Matt Wolff

settings.quote: Thanks Guys!!! Been using it non stop. Love it!!!
settings.title: Jimmy Walker

settings.quote: I love it! Thank you again Perfect Practice
settings.title: Charles Howell III

settings.quote: It's much better than other mats I have used over the years, Great Quality, thanks again!
settings.title: Vijay Singh

settings.quote: Feeling good!!! Thank you Perfect Practice, Go get yours!!
settings.title: Joaquin Niemann

settings.quote: I love the Perfect Practice putting mat, great for rainy day practice
settings.title: Lydia Ko

settings.quote: It’s working great and looking forward to having some fun with it the next few weeks before getting back out there!
settings.title: Talor Gooch

settings.quote: Thank you! Awesome putting mat!
settings.title: Nelly Korda

settings.text: Our handcrafted mats are made from the highest quality materials and proudly designed in the U.S.A.

settings.title: Exactly What I Needed
settings.quote: Ordered and received the standard mat with alignment mirror and had it within 4 days. In less than 30 minutes I feel more comfortable over the ball and putting down the line. Excellent training tool.
settings.author: Eric S.

settings.title: I'm actually getting better
settings.quote: Honestly thought I would never get better at putting. I have been golfing for 20+ years and nothing has made an impact. After I got my hands on this "Dustin Johnson Collection" I am a putting machine! It's legit crazy how many putts I'm making. My friends are amazed how quickly I've improved. Every product serves a purpose. Can't wait to go low this weekend!
settings.author: Chris B.

settings.title: Very Good
settings.quote: Solid construction and putting the surface is a good speed -- not too slow and not too fast. Excellent product and a great way to keep your game sharp while you’re away from the course.
settings.author: B. Thompson

settings.title: Putting Glasses "Eye Opening"
settings.quote: The use of the Putting Glasses opened my eyes to the fact that my head was moving all over the place right, left forward, and backward as I set up over my putts and while the clubface made contact. Using the Putting Glasses with the 15-foot Perfect Practice Putting Mat and on the putting green I have trained myself to be more still and more calm standing over the putt and through impact. Then I follow the path of the ball with the laser. A great tool that has definitely helped improve my putting. Highly recommend it.
settings.author: Robert M.

settings.title: Perfection
settings.quote: Exceeded expectations...I’ve tried less expensive options and this one is the bees knees!
settings.author: Jackie P.

settings.title: Awesome! Quick fix!
settings.quote:
Awesome! Quick fix!
After just 30 minutes of practicing with the TPM sticks I saw an immediate improvement on those pesky 4-6 footers I've always struggled with... now they are in the bag and a mandatory part of my warm up routine.
settings.author: Cameron B.

settings.title: About Time!!!
settings.quote: I love this product so much! The XL was a great investment! 15’ with the extra tracks makes practicing so much fun! Currently at 50 in a row, so it must be working!
settings.author: Edwin R.

settings.title: RainDrop(ping Putts)
settings.quote: This bad boy has been helping me drop more balls than a one-armed juggler! I love it! It is a must carry for all rounds to either practice or pre-round warm-ups. Keep up the good work!
settings.author: jhos

settings.title: Addictive putting aide
settings.quote: The best golf practice device I've ever owned. Thoughtful design and well made, I can't walk by without rolling a few putts. I also enjoy the putting and practice tips they have provided since I received the mat. Good stuff all around.
settings.author: Mark M.

settings.title: Smart Training Aid
settings.quote: This is a great aid to help you not break your wrist and keep the pendulum motion. It has helped a lot.
settings.author: Jack P.

settings.title: Ashley’s Review
settings.quote: I got the Perfect Putting Mat for my boyfriend and he loves it. He has it in his office and practices while working 😁. Don’t they all?
settings.author: Ashley P.

settings.title: They work
settings.quote: Okay, so they look goofy on my head. But the laser definitely shows you where your eyes are pointing and how much your head moves. I was surprised as to both. I was able to immediately improve my putting as a result.
settings.author: Jeffrey F.

settings.title: Builds Good Habits
settings.quote: After years of "streaky" putting this product is helping me finally become more consistent with my stroke.
settings.author: Chuck W.

settings.title: Raindrop
settings.quote: This is definitely one of my favorite training aids. It fits perfectly in my bag.
settings.author: Isabella J.

settings.title: Perfect Practice with another HOME RUN!
settings.quote: I recently tried these laser glasses and man am I impressed. I never realized how much my head moved while putting. I also realize that I never learned how to properly look down my aim line. After a few minutes with these on I take them off, and my body still feels like the laser is there! Now I am keeping my head perfectly still and draining more putts!
settings.author: Justin

settings.title: Muscle Memory
settings.quote: It really helps develop a true pendulum motion. Gets the big muscles working and learn to do it right.
settings.author: SCOTT WIPPEL

settings.title: Raindrop is awesome
settings.quote: I love this tool. It saves a lot of time and hassle compared to the normal lines that are always tangled and tough to find in your bag.
settings.author: John P.

settings.title: Laser Glasses = Head Connection I Needed
settings.quote: These laser glasses have made me a much better putter. They force you to keep your head perfectly still during the stroke. Before using these glasses, I rocked my head back and forth, not realizing I was doing it. I can put a putt on the perfect start line every time!
settings.author: Eric S.

settings.disclaimer: We respect your privacy and will never sell your information or spam your inbox

settings.title: Putt like a PGA Pro
settings.text: Get started with your putting mat and get putting like a PGA Pro.

settings.title: Who benefits from the Perfect Practice™ Putting Mats?
settings.answer:
Everyone can improve their putting! From the weekend hack to
the top PGA Professionals.

This mat will be the difference between winning your $20 nassau with your buddies, as well as notable pros making $100,000's more on the money list.

If we all agree that we can improve at putting, then what are you waiting for?!?!?!

settings.title: What is the Perfect Practice™ Putting Mat?
settings.answer:
Our putting mats are an at-home or office solution to improving your golf game. These mats are made with a unique Crystal Velvet material allowing the golf ball to roll identical to a perfect green. Also included is alignment "train-track" training to ensure a straight-back straight-through putting stroke.

What resulted is the BEST putting improvement mat on the market.

settings.title: Where should I use my Perfect Practice™ Putting Mat?
settings.answer: Ideally...wherever you want! The home, office, gym, basement, kitchen, and pro shop are all examples of where we have seen our mats used! Please make sure your mat is pulled tight to ensure a smoothe transition up the ramp.

settings.title: Why the Perfect Practice™ Putting Mat?
settings.answer:
Our belief is that the key to becoming a great putter is knowing you can hit it where you think you are aimed.

"ALL PUTTS ARE STRAIGHT PUTTS, except gravity gets in the way."

After a few minutes of using our mat, you will gain confidence in your ability to hit it where you are aimed. That translates to a lot more made putts on the course and a huge boost in confidence over the ball.

settings.title: What is the speed of the Perfect Practice™ Putting Mat?
settings.answer: The unique Crystal Velvet material featuring Tru-Roll Technology has your ball rolling 10-14 on the stimp depending what is under the mat. Hard floors roll closer to 14 whereas thick carpets tend to roll closer to a 10.

settings.title: What flooring is needed for the putting mat?
settings.answer: Our Perfect Practice putting mats work on all kinds of flooring...carpet, wood, tile and more! The goal is to find a flat spot so the putts do not break from uneven flooring.

settings.title: Can I use the mat outside?
settings.answer: Yes, our mats can be easily moved from one location to another whether its inside or outside. We don't recommend leaving the mat outside as the weather will deteriorate the velvet material.

settings.title: How much do your mats weigh?
settings.answer: Our Perfect Practice™ weighs 7.5 pounds and can easily store in its box or just rolled up off to the side.

settings.title: How long are the putting mats?
settings.answer: Our mats extend out over 9.5 feet, with printed markings at 2, 4, 6, and 8 feet.

settings.title: Can it be used by a left handed golfer?
settings.answer: Yes, both mats work great for Right Handed and Left Handed golfers. We now have our Standard Edition available specifically made for lefties!

settings.title: Can I vacuum this mat?
settings.answer: Yes, the Perfect Practice™ mats are able to be vacuumed.

settings.title: I noticed you have hassle-free returns. How do I access this?
settings.answer: Please see our return instructions here: Returns

settings.title: My tracking info states my order was delivered, but I haven't received my product(s) - what should I do?
settings.answer:
While we completely trust and value our carriers, issues with deliveries can occur every now and then. We recommend check with at all entrances or with neighbors to see if your order was accidentally delivered to the incorrect address. You can also contact the carrier directly to verify that they in fact did deliver the package. 

UPS: 1-888-742-5877

USPS: 1-800-275-8777

settings.title: Please note
settings.answer: We worked with our production facility to think through product design and our primary package, to make sure that it serves the needs of transportation all the way to your door so that we don't have redundant packaging added during the process. This is eliminates an "overbox" and excess material waste.

settings.title: Our goal is to create a quality golf products with fine regard for detail.
Zach Allen + Perfect Practice have designed a 5-Day System to get you started with your putting mat and get you putting like a PGA Pro.
settings.titlel: The famous Coach Rusty & Perfect Practice have designed a short tutorial video to help get you started with your laser glasses.
settings.contentl:
We recommend using your laser glasses in tandem with our Perfect Putting Mat, however they work on the putting green as well. If you don't already have a putting mat you can grab one here.

The four key ideas to focus on when using your laser glasses are outlined below:

  1. Ensures the golfer's eyes are directly over the ball. Get instant feedback!
  2. Teaches the golfer how to properly turn their head to look directly down their aim line
  3. Ensures the golfer's head stays completely still during the putting stroke
  4. After impact, teaches the golfer to follow the ball down the line to the hole (as most pros do!)

Check out the training video here:
settings.title3: Dr. Jeremy James of GOLFFOREVER teaches you how to relieve golf-related back and neck pain through simple stretching and exercises.
settings.content3:
Nothing grooves your putting stroke like a good practice session on your Perfect Putting Mat. However, with extended use, you may begin to experience stiffness, soreness, or even pain in your back and/or neck.

To help relieve (and prevent) putting-related discomfort, Dr. Jeremy James of GOLFFOREVER has provided you with a few quick and simple ways to improve the way your body feels and functions, so you can continue putting without pain. Watch the videos below to learn how to alleviate back and neck pain.

And if you want to learn more ways to improve your flexibility, mobility, and rotational power for golf, be sure to claim $20 off an annual GOLFFOREVER membership by using the code PUTT20 here.

settings.title: Earn a 15% commission for every successful referral
How does it work?
settings.text:
1. Join

    It's free and easy to join. Get up and running today.

  2. Advertise

    Choose from our products to advertise to your customers.

    Whether you are a large network, content site, social media influencer or blogger, we have simple linking tools to meet your advertising needs and help you monetize

  3. Earn

    Get up to 15% in commissions on successful referrals.

    Earn commissions from all qualifying purchases, not just the products you advertised. Plus, our competitive conversion rates help you maximize your earnings.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.content:
Promote the Perfect Practice website via tracking links and/or discount codes to your community and make a percent of each sale.
You will make a set commission of 15% on gross sales referred through your tracking link or discount code for the life of the customer.
You will have the option of promoting a discount code. Coupon websites are not allowed.
No, participation is free. However, acceptance into the program is not guaranteed.
We pay out once a month by PayPal.

settings.title: Wholesale Registration
settings.text: Please enter your information below to be contacted by one of Perfect Practice's wholesale account representatives.

settings.title: Fill out the form below to get started.
settings.content: We will review your information and get back to you. Wholesale minimums start at 6 mats.

settings.title: We're here to help
settings.content: By partnering with Perfect Practice your customers can enjoy our game changing putting mats and more. Join the hundreds of pro shops and retailers who are already achieving great sales success. If you are having difficulties, please email info@perfectpractice.golf.

settings.low_stock_text: 1) Purchase your custom Perfect Putting Mat here. 2) Once you submit your artwork, our team will create and send a mock-up for your approval. 3) Once artwork is approved, production begins. 4) Production time is 3-4 weeks. 5) Your order ships.
settings.branded_text: The perfect corporate or clubhouse option.

settings.content:
Returns are FREE*

Click here to get your prepaid shipping label.

All domestic orders will include a FREE prepaid return mailing label. Please do NOT return damaged/defective items. To ship an item back to Perfect Practice please:

  • Pack your item(s) and affix the prepaid mailing label to the top of the package.
  • If you are including items from multiple orders please write down the order numbers on a sheet of paper and include them in the package.
  • Mail your package using one of the following methods:
    1. Drop your package at a UPS location. The label is prepaid and requires nothing else on your end.
    2. Alternatively, you can leave the package off at a location that has a daily UPS pick up.

Because you have enough to worry about right now...

Our policy lasts 60 days. If 60 days have gone by since you received your item, unfortunately we can’t offer you a refund.

Please feel free to reach out to our customer service team (info@perfectpractice.golf) should you have any concerns around getting your return product back to us, we will be happy to help.

*For U.S. customers, a prepaid return shipping label will be provided at no charge to return your merchandise (free shipping both ways).

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Returns take us 2-3 business days to process upon reaching our facility. Once your return is processed and your refund is issued, you will receive a refund on your original form of payment and a confirmation email. Refunds can take several business days to reflect on your credit card account. This varies depending on your financial institution.

If you receive an item that is damaged or defective, please contact customer service immediately. Do NOT initiate a return. We will send you a free replacement pending picture proof of damage/defect. The defective unit can be discarded or donated.

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again. Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted. Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted. If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at info@perfectpractice.golf

Please email info@perfectpractice.golf to initiate your return.

settings.title: Enter To Win a Signed Masters Flag

settings.quote: The reason I’ve been so successful this year is because I’ve putted very consistently. A lot of that has to do with practicing a little bit more. When I’m at home, I have my Perfect Putting Mat™ so I can hit some putts on it. I’ve always got one with me on the road, too.
settings.cite: Dustin Johnson, World No. 1 and 2020 PGA Tour Player of the Year

settings.title: Enter to win a Masters flag signed by 2020 Champion Dustin Johnson
settings.text: This is the perfect addition to any office or man cave and a little something to bring back memories of the best tournament of the year.  It looks great hanging over a Perfect Putting Mat™, too!

settings.title: Practice Like A Major Champion
settings.header-copy-1: Dustin Johnson had a secret weapon heading into the 2020 Masters. Before and after his rounds, he was using Perfect Practice training aids that helped him make more putts under pressure.
settings.header-copy-2:
The Dustin Johnson Practice Collection includes the training aids DJ and more than 100 other tour pros use every day: The Perfect Practice Mat, The Raindrop, TPM, and Laser Putting Glasses.

These core products are guaranteed to improve your technique and consistency immediately.  The more you use them, the more putts you’ll make.

settings.product-row-copy:
Dustin Johnson spends 95% of his time practicing putts from inside 10 feet, and he uses his Perfect Putting Mat to help him practice those putts anytime, anywhere.

The Perfect Putting Mat has a tour-inspired design that helps golfers improve every aspect of their putting. With its train-track alignment aids and two hole sizes (regulation and reduced), there’s never been a faster or easier way to start making more putts.
settings.product-row-quote: "When I’m at home, I’ve always got my putting mat. And when I’m on the road, I always take one with me. It keeps me consistent.”

settings.product-row-copy:
Putting strings have helped golfers improve their putting for a long time. So why don’t more golfers use them? Because they’ve always been a pain to setup and store. Not anymore. 

The Raindrop was developed with GOLF Top-100 Instructor and Puting Guru Matt Killen to be easy and convenient to use. With its retractable design, golfers can set up The Raindrop in a few seconds and store it in the bag without worrying about it tangling or damaging other items.
settings.product-row-quote: “Amateur golfers and even professionals struggle to start breaking putts on the right line. The Raindrop makes it easy to see the correct starting line. You’ll be amazed at how many more putts you’ll make if you practice with The Raindrop.”
settings.quote_author_name: -- Matt Killen, GOLF Top-100 Instructor and Putting Guru

settings.product-row-copy:
To putt well, golfers need to practice their eye position. In the past, that meant asking a coach to watch you putt. Not with the Laser Putting Glasses. They make it easy for all golfers to see where their eyes are positioned before, during, and after the stroke. 

Have a coach already? So does Dustin Johnson, and he still uses the Laser Putting Glasses. They give him immediate feedback on where his eyes are at address, if his head moves during the stroke, and if his head is properly rotating down the line after the ball leaves his putter.
settings.product-row-quote: “The Laser Putting Glasses make sure I’m not falling into any bad habits, and that’s a big deal. Yes, they look kind of crazy, but they’re the best at what they do.”

settings.product-row-copy:
The True Pendulum Motion (TPM) makes it possible to feel a perfect putting stroke every time. As Dustin Johnson says, “You can’t really hit it offline with the TPM. It forces you into the perfect position and makes you take a perfect stroke.”  

TPM is easy to set up and works with any putter or grip style. It also collapses for easy storage so you can use it anywhere.
settings.product-row-quote: “I’ve taught with almost every putting training aid out there. The TPM is by far the best and simplest.”
settings.quote_author_name: -- Zach Allen, Southern California PGA Teacher of The Year, Golf Digest Best Young Teacher

settings.title: Why Golfers Should Embrace Training Aids
settings.answer:
Golf is hard. Finding time to practice is even harder.

Perfect Practice training aids are thoughtfully designed to inspire golfers to practice more... and practice better. They're guaranteed to help you lower your scores without changing anything else.

settings.title: Best Sellers
settings.sub_title: Our best-selling and most requested training aides.

settings.title: Who benefits from Perfect Practice Putting Mats?
settings.answer:
Everyone! Our premium putting pats help every golfer practice more and practice better. For Tour Pros like Dustin Johnson, making one extra putt per tournament can be worth hundreds of thousands of dollars!

For everyone else, who can put a price on taking a $20 Nassau off your buddies? Our putting mats will help you leave the course with a smile (or maybe even a trophy).

settings.title: Where should I use my Perfect Practice Putting Mat?
settings.answer:
Indoors or outdoors... anywhere you have a flat surface such as your living room, office, gym, basement, kitchen, or pro shop. Please make sure your mat is puled tight to ensure a smooth transition up the ramp. And if you're using it outside, bring it indoors when you're finished.

If you mat happens to get dirty, simply vacuum it as you would any carpet.

settings.title: Why the Perfect Practice Putting Mat?
settings.answer: After a few minutes of using our mat, you will gain confidence in your ability to hit your putts where you are aimed. That translates to a lot more made putts on the course and a huge boost in confidence over the ball.

settings.title: What is the speed of the Perfect Practice Putting Mat?
settings.answer: We spent a lot of time perfecting our Crystal Velvet material with Tru-Roll Technology, which will roll out at 10-14 on the stamp meter depending what is under the mat. Hard floors roll closer to 14 whereas thick carpets tend to roll closer to 10.

settings.title: How much do your mats weigh?
settings.answer: Our Perfect Practice Putting Mat (Standard Edition) weigh 7.5 pounds and can be discreetly stored anywhere.

settings.title: How long are the putting mats?
settings.answer: The Perfect Putting Mat (Standard Edition) extends 9.5 feet with printed markings at 2, 4, 6, and 8 feet. We also have a shorter mat (Compact Edition) and a longer mat (XL Edition).

settings.title: Can lefties use your putting mats?
settings.answer: Yes, both mats work great for righties and lefties. We also have a mat made specifically for lefties

settings.title: I noticed you have hassle-free returns. How do I access this?
settings.answer: Please see our return instructions here: Returns

settings.title: My tracking info states my order was delivered, but I haven't received my product(s). What should I do?
settings.answer:
We trust and value our carriers, but issues with deliveries can occur every now and then. We recommend checking at all entrances or with neighbors to see if your order was accidentally delivered to the incorrect address.

You can also contact the carrier directly to verify that they in fact did deliver the package.

UPS: 1-888-742-5877

USPS: 1-800-275-877
